definition: low-alcohol beer/non-alcoholic beer (typically, 0.5% ABV or less)

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店已经开始出售法国棍式面包和比利时啤酒。

sentences.english: A strong wind blows the beer can into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一阵强大的风把啤酒罐吹到了河里面了。

sentences.english: My favorite beer is from a microbrewery.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的啤酒是一家小酿酒厂出产的。

sentences.english: At Oktoberfest, many people drink too much beer and then pass out.
sentences.chinese: 在啤酒节时，许多人会因喝太多啤酒而昏睡不醒。

sentences.english: At Oktoberfest, many people drink too much beer and then pass out.
sentences.chinese: 在啤酒节时，许多人会因喝太多啤酒而昏睡不醒。

sentences.english: A glass of Tsing Tao beer, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我来一杯青岛啤酒吧。

sentences.english: It is indicated that it is an interested problem on the use of polyester bottle in packing beer.
sentences.chinese: 指出研制灌装啤酒用聚酯瓶是近年的一个热门课题。

sentences.english: I stick to my usual, one bottle of well-chilled Tsingtao beer.
sentences.chinese: 老规矩，来一瓶冰镇青岛啤酒。

sentences.english: The Card doesn't actually give you discounts on beer.
sentences.chinese: 这张卡并没有给你啤酒的折扣。

sentences.english: So go ahead. Enter that beer-funneling contest.
sentences.chinese: 去吧，加入啤酒烟囱比赛。

sentences.english: It is illegal to take more than three sips of beer at a time while standing.
sentences.chinese: 站著时一次啜饮三口以上的啤酒是违法的。

sentences.english: 'They see them as status symbols, ' Dr. Chen says.
sentences.chinese: 陈焕然称，啤酒肚被视为一种地位的象征。

sentences.english: We drink whisky mixed with beer.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝掺有啤酒的威士忌。

sentences.english: I hear there is a (kegger) [beer party] at John's house tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我传闻今晚在约翰家里有一个啤酒集会。

sentences.english: Someone brought cold cuts, dark bread, and beer from the jeep.
sentences.chinese: 有人把吉普车上的冻肉，黑面包和啤酒送上来。

sentences.english: We drank cheap Shancheng Beer, we joked around, we took turns singing songs.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝了廉价的山城啤酒，我们开玩笑，轮流唱歌。

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
